metadata.name: Boys In Blue #1
metadata.description:
"Boys In Blue" is an original song by LÃ¸yd & OD Temper. ðŸš¨  
The track is accompanied by a music video conceptualised around an entertainment museum which touches on the origin of police, their militarisation and the alarming increase of surveillance states.

The NFT collection (6 unique 1/1) is an arm of that concept, akin to memorabilia taken from the museum's gift shop.

10% of the initial sale will go to Legacy Of War Foundation  
https://www.legacyofwarfoundation.com/

Music/sound design by LÃ¸yd,  
3D assets by MW Stands For,  
Art direction/animation by Tarek Okbir.

https://www.instagram.com/loydbe/  
https://www.instagram.com/odtemper/

Reach out to loydmusic@outlook.com for the original file.
